name: Albums.Relationships
desc: The relationships for an album resource.

items.name: artists
items.desc: The artists associated with the album. By default, artists includes identifiers only. Fetch limits: 10 default, 10 maximum

items.name: genres
items.desc: The genres for the album. By default, genres not included. Fetch limits: None

items.name: tracks
items.desc: The songs and music videos on the album. By default, tracks includes objects. Fetch limits: 300 default, 300 maximum

items.name: library
items.desc: The album in the userâ€™s library for the catalog album, if any.Fetch limits: None

items.name: record-labels
items.desc: The record labels for the albumFetch limits: 10 default, 10 maximum.
